dynaForm.name: dynaforms_List
dynaForm.DYN_UID: SELECT DYN_UID, T.CON_VALUE AS DYN_TITLE FROM DYNAFORM LEFT JOIN CONTENT as T ON (T.CON_ID=DYN_UID AND T.CON_CATEGORY='DYN_TITLE') LEFT JOIN CONTENT AS D ON (D.CON_ID=DYN_UID AND D.CON_CATEGORY='DYN_DESCRIPTION') where PRO_UID = @@PRO_UID ORDER BY DYN_TITLE ASC Dynaform
